title: morning_puppy_feeding_dry_food
summary: Morning feeding of puppies consuming dry dog food.
description: Puppies were fed dry dog food in the morning. Feeding occurred without formal feeding containers. Food was provided directly to ensure puppies were not deprived of nutrition.

animal_context.note: Feeding prioritized availability of food over equipment conditions.

temporal_context.continuity_note: Routine animal care following first environmental record of the day.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for independent verification.
